results.content:
Best starting point for any level of developer who wants to learn how to use dapper,vue.js and api in asp.net core.

I really enjoyed this course and learnt a lot. I'm now able to use vue.js to connect to my api.

Thank you so much.  I will recommend this course to anybody who wants to learn (Dapper, Vue.js, Asp.net Core and Web API)

response.content: Thanks for your rating, glad to see you happy :)

results.content: This course is useful if you are a .NET web developer trying to learn Vue.js. The positives are this course does a nice job of providing an intro to Dapper, Java Web Tokens, etc. On the downside, the presentations of the material are what you would see at a user-group meeting rather than in an instructor-led course. Here the student can really only load the final project and follow along. Its not a course where you build something. Still, this course was worth the purchase price.
results.content_html: This course is useful if you are a .NET web developer trying to learn Vue.js. The positives are this course does a nice job of providing an intro to Dapper, Java Web Tokens, etc. On the downside, the presentations of the material are what you would see at a user-group meeting rather than in an instructor-led course. Here the student can really only load the final project and follow along. Its not a course where you build something. Still, this course was worth the purchase price.
